price: 1. Saacadda (Qiyaame) way soo dhowaatay, dayaxiina wuxuu u kala dhanbalmay labo gabal2.
footnotes:
1. Al-Qamar: Dayaxa.
 2. Tani waxay aheyd calaamo mucjisad ah uu Alle siiyey Nabi Muxammad s.c.w. markay Quraysh ka dalbeen inuu tusiyo mucjiso.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
